entry.title: Script Abuse Potential?
entry.summary: In this discussion forum, a user has raised a concern about a potential attack vector using a specific pk_script. The script in question includes several op_2dup and op_hash160 commands, among others, and the user is questioning whether it could be exploited by a malicious actor. While the validity of the script is not in question, the possibility of it being used for nefarious purposes is still being debated. Other users in the forum are weighing in on the issue, offering their own insights and opinions.
